item.description:
This will be a brisk, 5 mile hike.  There are some hills, so be prepared. There are some wide trails, single track trails and fields that we will be hiking on.  This hike is off-leash.

 

Please, if you RSVP YES and on the morning of the hike you do not plan on attending, please change your RSVP to NO, or call my cell.  This past Sunday, the group waited 20 minutes for 3 people who did not show-up or call. 

 

I drive a blue Jeep Cherokee.  My cell number is:  (508) 559-3677.
item.how_to_find_us: Google a search for Myles Standish State Forest, click on the map, we will be parked at P2 on Upper College Pond Road
item.name: Myles Standish State Forest
